name: excel-content-add-in-hello-world
title: Create an Excel content add-in that displays selected text
shortDescription: Create a simple Excel content add-in that displays selected text.
longDescription: Learn how to build an Office content add-in that displays the selected text from an Excel worksheet.

thumbnails.alt: The content add-in open in Excel.

references.name: Office Add-ins platform overview
references.description: You can use the Office Add-ins platform to build solutions that extend Office applications and interact with content in Office documents.

references.name: Content add-ins
references.description: Content add-ins are surfaces that can be embedded directly into Excel or PowerPoint documents.
